      • executeAndWaitForShell

        public static boolean executeAndWaitForShell(java.lang.String scriptPath,
                                             java.lang.String runningFilePath,
                                             java.lang.String runningFileMessage,
                                             boolean appendRemoveCommand,
                                             java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.String[] outputFilePaths,
                                             OutputFileProcessor outputFileProcessor,
                                             ShellScriptWatcher watcher,
                                             boolean visibleTerminal)
        executes a shell script at "scriptPath". If runningFilePath is not blank and not null, then Mesquite will create a file there that will serve as a flag to Mesquite that the script is running.

      • executeAndWaitForShell

        public static boolean executeAndWaitForShell(java.lang.String scriptPath,
                                             java.lang.String runningFilePath,
                                             java.lang.String runningFileMessage,
                                             boolean appendRemoveCommand,
                                             java.lang.String name)
        executes a shell script at "scriptPath". If runningFilePath is not blank and not null, then Mesquite will create a file there that will serve as a flag to Mesquite that the script is running.
